description: FIGURES 172–187. Calapnita lawangan sp. nov. (172–179; RMNH, ARA 17815–16) and C. bugis sp. nov. (180–187; RMNH, ARA 17420). 172–173, 180–181. Left procursi, prolateral and retrolateral views (arrow points at distinctive undulating ridge). 174, 182. Left palpal trochanters, retrolateral views. 175, 183. Left palpal femora, prolateral views. 176–177, 184–185. Right male chelicerae, frontal and lateral views. 178, 186. Epigyna, ventral views. 179, 187. Cleared female genitalia, dorsal views. Scale lines: 0.3 mm.
name: FIGURES 172–187 in Revision and cladistic analysis of the Southeast Asian leaf-dwelling spider genus Calapnita Simon (Araneae, Pholcidae)
